column4: well. when i run the makefile it errors saying :     luaconf.h:263:31: error: readline/readline.h: No such file or directory    luaconf.h:264:30: error: readline/history.h: No such file or directory
: Sounds like you're missing the readline library...?
: In general terms, use synaptic and install libreadline-dev and readline-common
: In synaptic, hit Control-F to find matching package names.
